1.text: Place the cooked turkey on a clean wooden board.

2.text: Allow the turkey to stand at room temperature for 10-15 minutes or longer after roasting.

3.text: Check the quality of the knife before proceeding.

5.text: Remove a little skin from the neck-end of the turkey's breast.

6.text: Poke into the cavity with your finger, feeling around for the wishbone.

7.text: Grasp the wishbone carefully and remove it from the turkey.

8.text: Allow the wishbone to dry for a few days, and then use it to make a wish.

10.text: Remove as much meat as you can.

11.text: Cut the leg at its knee joint.

12.text: Slice the thigh meat by holding it firmly to the cutting surface with a fork.

13.text: Cut into the bird alongside its breastbone.

14.text: Angle the knife and cut the meat away from the carcass.

15.text: Cut off the wing tips from the breasts.

16.text: Slice the remaining meat against the grain.
